name: 陳盛有
objective: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分方程式之特殊解法，2.傅立葉(Fourier)級數及轉換，3.矩陣代數，4.偏微分方程式，5.數值方法，6.複變函數。
schedule:
1.	Power Series Method
2.	Legendre’s Equation
3.	Legendre Polynomials
4.	Frobenius Method
5.	Bessel’s Equation , Bessel Functions of the First Kind
6.	Bessel Functions of the Second Kind
7.	Sturm-Liouville Problems
8.	Orthogonal Eigenfunction Expansions
9.	Midterm Exam.
10.	Trigonometric Fourier Series
11.	Functions Fourier Series
12.	Half-Range Expansions
13.	Complex Fourier Series
14.	Fourier Transforms
15.	Properties of the Fourier Transforms
16.	Partial Differential Equations
17.	Complex Analysis
18.	Final Exam.
materials:
作者:Kreyszig  書名:Advanced Engineering Mathematics 9th Edition
出版商:John Wiley & Sons,lnc.
